text: The Kabinda worm lizard (Monopeltis kabindae) is a worm lizard species in the family Amphisbaenidae. It is found in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and the Central African Republic. ==References== Category:Monopeltis Category:Reptiles of the Central African Republic Category:Reptiles of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Reptiles described in 1942 Category:Taxa named by Gaston-François de Witte Category:Taxa named by Raymond Laurent
title: Kabinda worm lizard
